website_summaries.verdict: This DASH diet book by a registered dietician with an M.S. in nutrition and dietetics focuses on a low-carb version of the popular DASH diet.
pros: The author is a dietician and has an M.S
Many people have found this diet an easy one to follow, not just for weight loss but to retrain you on how to eat healthfully
You can lose weight on this diet with virtually no exercise, though exercise is recommended
cons: Some people disapprove of low-fat and nonfat foods, which may be highly processed, and the inclusion of artificial sweeteners as part of the diet
The initial 2 weeks can be very tough for people and cause low energy

customer_reviews.title: It Worked For Me!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have lost weight after just 2 weeks on this. Not a lot, but enough to lose a belt loop. I've been menopausal for years, along with having an underactive thyroid, and losing weight has been almost impossible for me for the last few years. I'm unable to exercise much due to torn ligaments in my foot. Following this weight loss solution really helped. I'm going to get the other book with more recipes. Cutting out breads and sugar really did make a difference!
customer_reviews.author: Kathee Mc

customer_reviews.title: This book changed my life!
customer_reviews.text: Down almost 40lbs from following this diet. I also exercize now its getting much easier. My blood work is all good and was able to get off acid reflux medication and one of my blood pressure pills!!!
customer_reviews.author: izbaby

customer_reviews.title: Outdated.
customer_reviews.text: This book is in desperate need of an update. My goodness it’s 2019 and she’s recommending artificially sweetened Jello? Not to mention processed meat and cheese. Also there is too much of a reliance on dairy in general, a food group that causes a lot of problems for many Americans. I’m returning this and bought Food, What The Heck Should I Eat. It it’s much more up to date and would never suggest and artificial anything!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Great Book!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful book. If you follow it the way it says, you will lose weight fast in the first two weeks . I loss 8 pounds in two weeks. The next two weeks I loss 5 pounds. And I feel great. I have a way to go but this book has taught me how to eat foods that will help with the weight lost. I never feel hungry. And my blood pressure is great!
customer_reviews.author: vc

customer_reviews.title: Better than a book
customer_reviews.text: I hate reading, but this book is laid out so you can use it in whatever way you want. It has recipes in one section, or example meal plans in another. I skipped a lot of the actual reading, and used it for all the resources it contained, This helped save me time, so I could get down to business. After the first week I was down 8 lbs. I look forward to continuing my journey. Btw the index is your friend.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle Frith-Bullard

customer_reviews.title: I lost about a pound and a half a week ...
customer_reviews.text: I lost about a pound and a half a week with this diet book and have felt improvements with my depression. The diet is an adjustment, but it feels more flexible than others. My girlfriend wanted me to add that she's been losing about a pound per week since we started.
customer_reviews.author: zack

customer_reviews.title: Good Guidelines
customer_reviews.text: The book provides good guidelines to a healthy living, specifically in terms of blood pressure, cholesterol and triglycerides. The content, dietary guidelines as well as the recipes reminded me a lot of the South Beach Diet, for those of you who had tried it. Only major question mark for me is, in this day and age, especially given the many research, how a healthy living diet can advise the use of artificial sweeteners.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: and it was awesome! You don't go hungry
customer_reviews.text: While I didn't use this for blood pressure (mine is normal), I did use this to prepare for weight loss surgery, and it was awesome! You don't go hungry, it revs up your energy (with plant fats and lean protein), it's not expensive, and it's easy to follow. I highly recommend it for anyone, surgery or not. :)
customer_reviews.author: Giggles

customer_reviews.title: Not buying the hype that this is “ the healthiest diet”
customer_reviews.text: I returned this book after thumbing through it once. I can’t believe this is considered healthy. Splenda, really? Jello, what? This is awful. I was expecting something healthy and got a fad diet book. I see people lost weight on it, but health isn’t just a medical test. It’s a whole body thing. Eating fat free artificially sweetened dairy yogurt, or drinking fat free milk is a terrible idea. We need the fat to digest it if we are going to eat it, which we shouldn’t because it’s unhealthy in the first place. No way this is “the healthiest diet”.
customer_reviews.author: CuzIMdaMama

customer_reviews.title: A fantastic book that makes so much sense in terms of ...
customer_reviews.text: A fantastic book that makes so much sense in terms of helping change eating habits not just for weight loss but for overall improvement in health! I recommend this book highly to anyone looking to take charge of her/his health through one of the most important activities - eating!
customer_reviews.author: Cleanface

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad diet, but beware that they use alot of ...
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad diet, but beware that they use alot of diary. So if you are allergic to any milk products, forget about it.
customer_reviews.author: s carlson

customer_reviews.title: Stop the Silent Killer
customer_reviews.text: Save your life and follow this book if you have hypertensive BP. I went for a routine visit and found I was type II hypertensive 165/110. A stroke or Heart attack could kill me at any minute. Thing is I feel fine. Its a silent killer. I immediately eliminated Sodium and any processed food, went on this diet and exercised everyday. My weight is way over where it should be and that's a major factor too. I also eliminated most caffeine and a good deal of alchohol. Nothing like being terrified to motivate you
customer_reviews.author: james cole

customer_reviews.title: Jello is not a fruit
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for a healthy meal plan I could follow, but this book inexplicably suggests eating sugar-free jello for 2 weeks as a substitute for fruit. I'm pretty sure that's not what the DASH diet is supposed to be.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Diet Works
customer_reviews.text: Well ordered book, easy to follow, lots of support information. I had high blood pressure and two doctors wanted to put me on medication. I started this diet and followed it strictly. After the first week my bp was 115/80 and I had lost 5 pounds. Sharing in the hopes that someone else will give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Burrow

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars +++++
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this book and diet. Extremely easy to read and it provides actual real life meal plans that are easy, simple, don't require a bunch of out of the ordinary specialty ingredients, and most importantly the GOOD food!!!! It is a lot of food & prep work each day, but it's good healthy food. A lot of salads, but easy to make. This is now a staple in our family and our new food lifestyle.
customer_reviews.author: Mastiff Mom

customer_reviews.title: Easy to follow.
customer_reviews.text: After trying many diets I decided on this highly rated one to lower my weight, cholesterol and blood pressure. I have had no problem staying on it and the menus for each day help tremendously. I lost 5 lbs. the first week and am continuing to lose. Looking forward to more days on this journey to healthy living.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie Bee

customer_reviews.title: My High Blood Pressure Is Gone!
customer_reviews.text: A good friend recommended this book so we could lose weight together. I've been following the meals plans in the book for almost 8 months. I started exercising in March, and now I am more consistent. I've lost almost 20 pounds! I went to the doctor today for my blood pressure checkup. I no longer have to take medication! I always assumed I would have high blood pressure for life because of family history. I just turned 50 so this is for any age! My friend is 63 and also lost 20 pounds! For anyone who wants to cure their high blood pressure, lose weight and feel good I highly recommend this book!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Book - Simple Solutions for Diet and Blood pressure Control
customer_reviews.text: Great book with excellent ideas for both losing weight and getting your blood pressure and cholesterol under control. The plan is not difficult to follow and food choices are basic and easy to follow. Lots of recipes that use simple ingredients. I recommend this book to anyone wanting to get a diet that is easy to follow and also get their health under better control.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Cadile

customer_reviews.title: Ok for weight loss...
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed in the diet options for the book. Looking for less salt and options included Canadian Bacon for breakfast with tomato juice... I feel still on the higher salt level. Even though they said low sodium tomato juice... but plan would definitely help lose weight but very small food portions. I feel more fruit and veggies could be inserted
customer_reviews.author: Phrudy Fam

customer_reviews.title: Lies and deception!!!!! That’s what I read!!!
customer_reviews.text: This review is on all three books purchased...any “diet” that tells you you can’t eat any carbs, fats, or whatever for 2 weeks is trash! It’s basically telling you to put your body in emergency mode... thus storing everything as fat and leaving you vulnerable to illnesses because your body thinks it’s starving!!! I’m sorry I spent my money on this crap!!!
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Not so healthly
customer_reviews.text: Author pushes Artificial sweetner - not healthly to eat sugar free jello everyday
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to understand
customer_reviews.text: The plan as she explains it is easy to understand. I haven’t begun the diet but many of the principles are similar to Weight Watchers so I have confidence that it should work. I am vegetarian (I also eat fish) so I’m glad they included vegetarian options. I look forward to giving this a try although I’m not excited about 2 weeks without fruit!
customer_reviews.author: Annette Hedden

customer_reviews.title: Great support group to share recipes and success/Failures too
customer_reviews.text: There is a support group on FB that is helpful also. IF you have questions they can tell you what page the info you need is on. Great support group to share recipes and success/Failures too!!
customer_reviews.author: Piedmont1fa

customer_reviews.title: At the Top of Most "Best Diet" Lists and Now at the Top of Mine!
customer_reviews.text: Smart and totally doable. Keep trying to find the right fit for me to lose 20 lbs and I thik this is the one! After googling "top diets" I kept seeing this at the top of most lists, so I ordered the book. So far so good. Still in first week so I cant say how effective yet, but I feel like I am on the right track. Plus I am eating real food vs yucky packaged which I much prefer.
customer_reviews.author: Colleendub

customer_reviews.title: The DASH Diet is such a good eating plan to adopt
customer_reviews.text: The DASH Diet is such a good eating plan to adopt, but it is very complicated to follow and I think Marla Heller provides so much information, study results, statistics, etc that it seems even more complicated! I was looking for a fairly simple read with tools to follow the diet and them, but they were buried in mounds of information.
customer_reviews.author: LindaH

customer_reviews.title: Best diet I have ever been on
customer_reviews.text: I've lost 27lbs and can't say enough about how this helped me. Basic instructions easy to follow and good recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Nowak

customer_reviews.title: I was wrong
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several different diets. I found the right fit in the Dash Diet. I thought I would not be able to loose weight due to menopause. Glad I was wrong. I can see myself eating this way for the rest of my life.
customer_reviews.author: Happy shopper

customer_reviews.title: Healthy diet
customer_reviews.text: After reading this diet that my doctor recommended I find it is just not for me. It is mostly fish, eggs and cheese which I don't and never did eat so it does not leave me much to eat. I f you like eggs can work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Violet L. Eubank

customer_reviews.title: terrific plan. Lost 20 pounds easily and it's easy ...
customer_reviews.text: terrific plan. Lost 20 pounds easily and it's easy to maintain. Not an obsessive diet. Worked great for weight loss and got to my ideal weight but my BP still hasn't budged in 6 months. My MD says to stick with it--i am, at least i know I am on a healthy track.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: The book is in excellent condition and arrived earlier than estimated
customer_reviews.text: The book is in excellent condition and arrived earlier than estimated. It contains great information and is easy to read. I have extremely high blood pressure and am hoping that following the DASH diet will help lower it. The meal plans and recipes seem simple and use foods available in my local grocery. Very pleased with both the product and transaction.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Already seeing results!
customer_reviews.text: Still reading this but my husband who is the one with HBP has already lost 15lbs and has more control of his bottom number.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy :-)

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work for everyone
customer_reviews.text: It sounded great I got all the food I needed I followed it for a week and I gained 2 pounds and I do not believe I even cheated! So I’m just going back to my normal way of eating, sensible choices and serving sizes and exercise daily.
customer_reviews.author: Meribeth Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Great book
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to follow. Lost 15 pounds first 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: She is a smart cookie! You won't be sorry
customer_reviews.text: Marla Heller tells you everything in this book of how to do it. She has the credentials behind her that are proven to work. She is a smart cookie! You won't be sorry. Buy the book. My doctor recommended her books to me to reduce some pounds myself.
customer_reviews.author: southern lady

customer_reviews.title: Recipes, menus and shopping lists add to value of this book.
customer_reviews.text: I think I will like this book, as I recently began to explore the DASH diet for health reasons. The menus, recipes and shopping lists in this book seem that they will make it easy to follow the DASH diet, which is good for me, because I am a chronic diet dropout.
customer_reviews.author: Readsalot

customer_reviews.title: Amazing meal plan for life
customer_reviews.text: Amazing meal plan for life. If you want a plan to tame your eating for life this is it. My husband and I are both 50 and it was beyond time to change how we ate. Neither of us wanted to count calories or feel slaves to a diet. I started doing research and found this plan. What a game changer. We. Are each down 23 lbs and counting. We started January 12 and have lost steadily one to 3 puounds a week. We are just starting to incorporate exercise along with healthy eating. This plan is a game changer for sure. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: It's working for me
customer_reviews.text: This diet is easy to follow, and it is working for me. It's America's top-rated diet, and I see why. If it works for me, the queen of failed diets, it will probably work for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jujugo

customer_reviews.title: How to Eat for the Rest of Your Life
customer_reviews.text: My husband barely survived a massive heart attack in March, and during his stay in the hospital several nurses told us about this diet. I checked it out via the Mayo Clinic website and some other online resources and decided to try it. It is a very common sense approach to eating for a lifetime. I have been on it for three weeks and have lost 10 pounds. It is easy to follow and there are a few recipes in the book if you need them. There are also online resources that I find quite helpful. If you are looking for a way to eat that will improve your life and probably extend your lifetime buy this book.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Recipes took to long to make. I gave it away.
customer_reviews.author: Cruise fanatic

customer_reviews.title: Ease to adapt Diet😁
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a friend who want to try this diet. She found it very easy and enjoyed it very much plus she lost weight 😁
customer_reviews.author: MO

customer_reviews.title: Just do Atkins
customer_reviews.text: I was really disappointed in this book. Seemed to be cobbled together from internet articles and ultimately it's do Atkins
customer_reviews.author: Toni5000

customer_reviews.title: Easy to follow
customer_reviews.text: I love this book. Go to it all the time. Lowered all my numbers by 10% after the 1st month.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Great book!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because I have had open heart surgery,and also Rheumatoid arthritis,and hypertension.i am using this to help me get a handle on my health. Easy to read and understand.
customer_reviews.author: morninglory

customer_reviews.title: ... "by the book" and the diet is working just fine. I'm averaging about 2 lb loss every week ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm going "by the book" and the diet is working just fine. I'm averaging about 2 lb loss every week without having to change my daily routine aside from the diet. Cool.
customer_reviews.author: Ken D

customer_reviews.title: Very good book
customer_reviews.text: Book came in good condition and filled with good information. Easy to follow. Thanks again. Kathy
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Best program ever
customer_reviews.text: This is a simple yet powerful program to help manage self-destructive behavior and eat for improved health. It is easy to follow, provides plenty of food, and is satisfying. You don't leave the table feeling empty which is remarkable given you are not eating processed foods, starches or sugar. Amazing to me. I hate that empty only lettuce feeling. Not once has this program let me down, plus I am having success: broken a set point barrier in weight, stabilized my blood sugar and dropped my diastolic blood pressure number. Can't ask for more than that while eating well.
customer_reviews.author: Bettie  Banks

customer_reviews.title: Crap. The whole thing is crap.
customer_reviews.text: If I could give it no stars I would. Not once was there talk about low sodium except for your shopping list to buy low sodium tomato sauce. What’s with all the artificial sweetened jello and yogurt? I think this was a push of name brand foods and a round about way of saying low carbs/high protein. This one will go right in the recycle bin.
customer_reviews.author: loves to shop

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: I have tried all kinds of diet, some work for a while, than I get lost. I have PKD, this book was recommended, so I decided to give it a try. Following this 2 months and very happy. You don't get hungry and sugar stays level. Lost 8 pounds so far, without suffering. We will see what the future bringing.
customer_reviews.author: SouthernLady

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend, an easy read and much better alternative to medication.
customer_reviews.text: When my doctor suggested this instead of medication, I figured it was worth a try even though I was not very excited about it. Totally easy read and so helpful. I've recommended it a few times already. No one ever thinks a diet will make the difference, but this one made all the difference for me.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Finally a diet that makes some sense....
customer_reviews.text: This book does a great job of presenting a diet that makes sense and is scientifically sound. Helps to put in perspective and outright dispel a lot of the contradictory diet information that has been hanging around for the past 25 or so years. My husband purchased the book for himself. I read it so I could support his dieting efforts since I am the primary cook in the family. To my pleasant surprise I found the requirements of the diet reasonable and doable for the entire family. Modifications are easy to adapt to the specific needs of individual family members.
customer_reviews.author: tcwalter

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical
customer_reviews.text: Can you really eat Dairy Queen and Twinkies all day. After using this book with that philosophy I've managed to gain 47 lbs in seven short weeks and feel better then ever. My waist is now a 48 and I'm a big hit with the ladies. Thank you Dash Diet
customer_reviews.author: Carl Freeman

customer_reviews.title: My symptoms are gone and I haven't felt this good in a long time
customer_reviews.text: Been on this diet for a week. I have IBS and was concerned about all the fiber. My symptoms are gone and I haven't felt this good in a long time. Can't thank my doctor enough for recommending this diet to me.
customer_reviews.author: rose robinson

customer_reviews.title: Start Taking Control of Your Health
customer_reviews.text: I have been very successful with this plan. I also have high had blood pressure,and over weight. This plan is feasible,and affordable. The best part is it actually works. If you are serious about getting your health uder control this is a must have book.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Off to a good start!
customer_reviews.text: Have noticed this diet before and at age 63 nothing else is working. I just need to feel better and if finding my waistline again is part of the deal, I'm in. We are only on Day 2 of Phase 1. It's almost hard to eat everything recommended and that's a good problem. We had given the Diet a "test-run" a few months ago and it's very do-able and the recipes are tasty. Eating every 2 hours really curbs the hunger, cravings and temptations to go off program. I think we're on to something here.
customer_reviews.author: R&C Mobley

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to it's reputation!
customer_reviews.text: Just life changing. Will never regret getting on the DASH bandwagon.
customer_reviews.author: Niki2ode

customer_reviews.title: Healthy way to eat
customer_reviews.text: I was diagnosed with high blood pressure so I purchased this book and lost 15 pounds by following the Phase 1 and Phase 2 parts of the diet. Encourages eating basically a low fat, low carb diet high in fresh fruits and vegetables.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: DASH Works!
customer_reviews.text: This book is very helpful! It got me through a plateau and provided the tools to happily live beyond the reducing part of my diet.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Bettencourt

customer_reviews.title: Vegetarians don't count
customer_reviews.text: This book would get a 5 star if it weren't for the small amount of information for vegetarians. Suggested meal planning does not specify anything except meat choices; even the "Hearty Veggie Soup" starts with the first ingredient "sirloin". My husband and I are on the diet in the first phase but we aren't sure if we are eating enough of the right proteins especially since much of our regular diet comes from whole grains. However, because what to eat is spelled out, we are having an easy time - no counting calories. We have both lost weight and are not hungry.
customer_reviews.author: J. Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Get healthy
customer_reviews.text: Great book. But when arrived pages looked like they got wet. It's okay, I can still read but not the best quality.
customer_reviews.author: Bayak

customer_reviews.title: Great Book
customer_reviews.text: Love this book. I would recommend this to anyone interested in the Dash diet!
customer_reviews.author: Lanice

customer_reviews.title: Results right away
customer_reviews.text: I have been a lifetime member of Weight Watchers for over 16 years. I love this diet, I feel better look better and don't have to pay. I just keep the book handy for motivation or go on youTube. For me it is easier to fit into my lifestyle.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Seith

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Boring. Hard to get into. Not getting to the point
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Good topic for dieting
customer_reviews.text: This book was recommended by my doctor and is an interesting diet for those who want to lose weight slowly so it stays off. Easy to read . easy to follow diet.
customer_reviews.author: IRONMANN

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for us
customer_reviews.text: My husband has high blood pressure and since this is touted as one of the most successful diets out there we gave it a shot. We followed the plan very closely and monitored his blood pressure and weight all the while. We did not see any significant changes either and in addition it was not an easy plan to stick to. Really wanted it to work.
customer_reviews.author: sqbanh

customer_reviews.title: Great book
customer_reviews.text: Lost 20 lbs...stuck for years at certain weight...helped me get on track..in the beginning I was a little ambivalent. But after I broke a certain weight limit it blew my mind I was became very encouraged. Initially it help me lose all that weight. And I'm going to be using it to get back on track time and time again.and I've tried everything.
customer_reviews.author: rhosey

customer_reviews.title: DASH Diet a lot of work but worth it
customer_reviews.text: The book was very informative. It gave reasons as to why eating this way helps the body regulate itself. This diet was recommended by my doctor because I have high blood pressure, high cholesterol, and I am boarder-line diabetic. Even though the program was designed for those suffering from high blood pressure, the cholesterol and the diabetes numbers also dropped. Another by-product was weight loss. There are good recipes included and examples of how to organize your life to begin this program.
customer_reviews.author: brenda piper

customer_reviews.title: Easy and it Works
customer_reviews.text: Great book, all I wanted. I lost 10 pounds right away in the first week. Now 50 days later, I am down 30 pounds. This is NOT a diet, it is a lifestyle and one of the easiest methods I have tried. Hard to keep up with all the meals and snacks. My lipids are all in normal ranges now. I am also on Lipitor (generic).
customer_reviews.author: Robert C.

customer_reviews.title: I love this book
customer_reviews.text: I love this book. My mom and I have been using the menus and recipes for 5 days. Already lost weight and my BP numbers are down by just a few numbers. Wish id known about this diet before my mom had her heart attack.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: A good start
customer_reviews.text: At 51 I found out I have high blood pressure and pre-diabetes, on top of the 10 (ok, 15!) extra pounds I knew I was carrying around! I'm excited to have rediscovered the DASH Diet, especially in this brief but explanatory book. The only real criticism I have is the fair amount of complexity and time you often have to invest for even one dish sometimes. On the other hand, they're pretty damned delicious!
customer_reviews.author: David Hutcheson-Tipton

customer_reviews.title: Likes and dislikes
customer_reviews.text: This book is better than the Fast Metabolism Diet book because the suggested food portion (especially expensive protein source) is less. I haven't tried this diet yet, but based on what I saw on Doctor Oz's show, it's very promising. What I don't like about this book is that it doesn't cover about what option out there for people with hypothyroidism like me -- such as not being able to eat "too much" cheap source of protein such as tofu and vegetables in the cabbage family such as broccoli, cabbage, brussels sprouts, and cauliflower.
customer_reviews.author: JosieFIFI

customer_reviews.title: Easy to follow diet
customer_reviews.text: Well written by dietitian and is easy to follow. Similar to South Beach or Mediterranean diet but provides nutritional information.
customer_reviews.author: DeeMad17

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: This is a useless book. It’s very simple and you can find all this info on the internet. I was foolish to spend the money. Don’t be a fool.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Great support from the facebook group!
customer_reviews.text: Love this diet, very easy to follow and proven to be healthy! Quick weight loss the first two weeks, but the pounds are still coming off slowly but surely as the weeks go by! It's more a lifestyle and less a diet as I continue. Marla Heller has a weight loss group on facebook that follows this book and gives great support!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!! Off my blood pressure meds after only 6 wks
customer_reviews.text: I am off blood pressure meds after six weeks and today I am loading up clothes for goodwill that are too big instead of too little for a change, I have not lost tons of weight (only 7 lbs so far, I am not a fast loser) but I am working out with weights and an hrs. walk with my dog each day,(which I have done for years). love this new way of eating and not missing the sugar at all.
customer_reviews.author: I. Mchone

customer_reviews.title: Good diet healthy but my heart doctor told me it ...
customer_reviews.text: Good diet healthy but my heart doctor told me it only lower blood pressure 4 points. I am not over weight but if you want to loss some weight and maybe eat healthy this is your book.
customer_reviews.author: cowgal

customer_reviews.title: I love this book.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think I was going to be able to do this. But this book and its menus let me do it. I think its fantastic. BUT...it might be a little hard for some to do the DASH diet, well for the first couple of weeks anyway. But you will see results right away. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Basic healthy diet. Good for those just beginning to improve their diet.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty standard diet. It's a good book and good guidance for anyone who is just starting out. For me, though, it was nothing new.
customer_reviews.author: Ceesattler

customer_reviews.title: Valuable information
customer_reviews.text: I needed this approach to loose weight for high blood pressure. I lost just over 5 lbs. the first two weeks. On phase 2 of the diet I actually gained a lb. after the first week on it. I had to modify it to meet my goals. There are some contradictory statements in the book that the readers common sense can solve. Overall it does address the problem of weight, health and high blood pressure. I am glad I bought the book, aside from the diet itself there is a lot to learn of good solid information on the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid Wolsk

customer_reviews.title: Lifestyle Changer
customer_reviews.text: This book came highly recommended and it really is not that difficult to follow. The first few weeks you will get tired of eating eggs and salads. The nice thing about this diet is that you can still eat delicious food while also cutting down your sodium intake. I honestly did not realize how much salt/sodium I was taking in on a daily basis. It truly leads to a better lifestyle and ongoing results as opposed to other diets that may be considered a fad.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Fantactic
customer_reviews.text: I started this diet and started losing weigh the first week and 10 months later I am still losing weight this book is great and it tells you everything to help you to get health. I am off blood pressure med, cholesterol med, nexium for stomach have lost 60 pds. I am now able to do water aerobic. Get this book if you want to be healthy and get you life back. I have talked to people that it has helped with blood sugar problems.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnne Myers

customer_reviews.title: This diet works!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great book. The diet is very effective, and I don't feel as hungry as I thought I might. The author gives good advice, and recipes. If you follow the diet and exercise modestly, you will lose weight and feel good doing it. I lost 10 pounds within the first three weeks with some robust workouts on the Bowflex and daily walking.
customer_reviews.author: C. A. Sanders

customer_reviews.title: D.A.S..H.
customer_reviews.text: When i became borderline diabetic, I had to find a way to get my system back in line without having to do any type of diet that was unappetizing. My son recommended this diet and after reading through it, I found it to be very infornative and real. I love that it focuses on eating real food and not calories. easy to follow. highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: TUTUHAWK

customer_reviews.title: Great book with good menus and suggested meal planning
customer_reviews.text: Great book with good menus and suggested meal planning. Lost weight the first two weeks and wasn't hungry. This plan has meals that taste good and are easy to prepare.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good book for a good plan
customer_reviews.text: This diet is based on the scientific plan called "DASH" and is a modified version that includes an (optional) "jump start" of 10 days low/no carb. This part of it was very difficult for the first few days but it really works. I lost inches off my waist. More importantly though it helps to reeducate the reader about proper portions and new ways to cook and eat.
customer_reviews.author: m

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, Helpful Book!
customer_reviews.text: It breaks every meal and snack down into small parts. It gives you a shopping list to start with. It provides menus and a section on exercise. My goal was to lower my blood pressure a little bit and lose 10 pounds. I did that plus lost 2 inches around my waist in just 4 weeks. I found this book extremely user friendly and helpful.
customer_reviews.author: kevin jones

customer_reviews.title: Dash Diet
customer_reviews.text: My friends have all tried it with great results. Finally getting on board and so far so good. It's a good read too, motivational and understanding.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Good book, lots of life-style changes to be made
customer_reviews.text: Good book, lots of life-style changes to be made, not all recipes are worth the effort and you can find more on the net.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Klein

customer_reviews.title: Simple to follow and does work.
customer_reviews.text: I actually did lose about 9.5 pounds the first week on this diet combined with about 30 minutes per day on my treadmill. Was easy to follow, meals are simple, and the recipes are pretty good. You probably have most of the ingredients already, nothing exotic to buy. The first phase is to jump start you with low carbs for two weeks, then into phase II with some carbs, so it is doable. You truly don't have to do the time I did walking at first, but it did help me. Not too hard to stick to.
customer_reviews.author: murphyc

customer_reviews.title: Good book came damaged!!
customer_reviews.text: The book was great but it came moldy.. pagkage was intact.. just frustrating..
customer_reviews.author: P. Forster

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Same old recipes. I was hoping for more nutritional information, beyond low fat/no salt. There recipes are based on old and questionable information, nothing new here. very 1980's. Do your own nutritional research. dump sugar, eat twice as many vegetables, fruits, whole grains, drink clean water all day, and spark up dishes with no salt herbs (I use Penzey's)
customer_reviews.author: CloudShepherd

customer_reviews.title: Great, healthy eating plan
customer_reviews.text: I've been carrying around this book for the past 5.5 days- it's got some great tips, great information and great meal plans in it. Although I feel like I'm eat, Eat, EATING all the time, I realize I'm not hungry or craving anything. For the first time I feel like I could live my life eating a certain way- the DASH way. I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: JoDoSco

customer_reviews.title: Assisting in making positive life changes!
customer_reviews.text: Great book that's easy to follow. Helping me get my health on track
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: just eat right and exercise more...
customer_reviews.text: It is a very superficial take on a fairly popular common sense diet.
customer_reviews.author: Non-techie

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by Dr. Oz
customer_reviews.text: Thought this would be the perfect diet to jumpstart a new year (birthday), along with exercise. It did help my pattern of emotional eating and gave me a "script" to follow, but I had to spend a lot of extra money (outside of my shopping for my family) buying non preferred food items. Canadian bacon, avocados, laughing cow cheese, sugar free products, etc. I am thankful for the jumpstart, but did better (weight loss) when I ate only fruits and vegetables.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Lost 18 LBS so far
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the easiest plans to follow. I travel for a living and as long as i stay with lean protein and vegetables, I can follow even when I'm on the road. If you have problems losing weight, have high blood pressure (i'm off my meds and it's normal to low now) then you should try this. Talk to your DR first though, everyone is different!
customer_reviews.author: Dakota Bailey

customer_reviews.title: I was surprised to see how easy the 2 week start up plan was to use ...
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised to see how easy the 2 week start up plan was to use and it worked! I lost 6lbs the first week and have continued to lose weight each week. So far I've lost a total of 17 lbs, my goal is another 50-55 lbs. :)
customer_reviews.author: CGarofano

customer_reviews.title: Great advice and info!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great guide to the DASH diet! Super clear, lots of info and easy to follow. 100% recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia

customer_reviews.title: DASH diet
customer_reviews.text: The book has some good info and the plan does work. It's a sort of revised low carb/low sugar diet. It does include some fruit and grains after the first two weeks though. Most of this information, however, you can get for free from different sites on the internet or on the author's Facebook page. The book doesn't have much of anything that you can't find online.
customer_reviews.author: Ferdy

customer_reviews.title: New DASH Diet
customer_reviews.text: The new DASH diet has a 2-week induction phase that mimics the Atkins induction phase. For most people the initial weight loss is probably due to the salt decrease AND the carb restriction (water loss NOT fat loss). For me, a Type II diabetic, there seems to be too many carbs in the diet to maintain good blood glucose control. Nevertheless, for non-diabetics, this diet may be suitable. The book is well done with lots of useful information.
customer_reviews.author: David A Charlton

customer_reviews.title: This was the #1 rated diet by U. S ...
customer_reviews.text: This was the #1 rated diet by U.S. News and World Report for six years. The reason is that there is solid science behind it and it helps make the transition after weight loss to maintenance something achievable and sustainable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: The Dash Diet Weight Loss Solution: 2 Weeks to Drop Pounds, Boost Metabolism, and Get Healthy
